div.p: Covid-19 information available at https://www.warrenhills.org/covid19 [Click title for more]

a.title: Go to comments for Covid-19 Information

h1.span: WH in the News - DJ HICKERSON ENTERTAINS HEALTHCARE WORKERS

div.p: WH Business Teacher, Cedric Hickerson, joined forces with few friends in the event industry to say ‘thank you’ to healthcare workers the only way they know how, by bringing a party to the front lines of this epidemic. The health professionals enjoyed themselves and it felt great to see some smiles on their faces during these trying times.
A trailer transformed into a float showcased a big sign that read, “Thank you! You’re our Heroes!,” as DJ Cedrick Hickerson spun tunes for their enjoyment.
ALWAYS A GREAT DAY TO BE A BLUE STREAK!

a.aria-label: Go to comments for WH in the News - DJ HICKERSON ENTERTAINS HEALTHCARE WORKERS

h1.span: WH in the News - SKYLAND Conference First Team Awards

div.p: 2019-2020 Skyland Conference Bowling 1st Team for the girls; Samantha Irwin and Amanda Burdette.
2019-2020 Skyland Conference Bowling 1st Team for the boys; Frankie LoPresti. Honorable Mention: Tyler Ostrander

a.aria-label: Go to comments for WH in the News - SKYLAND Conference First Team Awards

h1.span: WH in the News - WH Demands Logo Recognition

p.a: The Streaks have spoken: Warren Hills demands logo recognition!

div.p: The Blue Streaks wildly outperformed their No. 26 ranking on the countdown and took 24 percent of the vote. Always a great day to be a Blue Streak!

a.aria-label: Go to comments for WH in the News - WH Demands Logo Recognition

h1.span: WH in the News - The Streak Mascot and Principal Kavcak honor the Class of 2020 Top 10

div.p: Yesterday, the Streak Mascot and Principal Kavcak put banners in the yards of our Top 10 students of the Class of 2020 - CONGRATULATIONS!
Elijah Camacho, Elizabeth Finnegan, Rachel Fitz, Panagiota Georgoutsos, Jordan Haytaian - VALEDICTORIAN, Heather Laffan, Kaitlyn Marsh - SALUTATORIAN, Daniel Pitsch, Elisha Stenger, Bryan Tran

a.aria-label: Go to comments for WH in the News - The Streak Mascot and Principal Kavcak honor the Class of 2020 Top 10

h1.span: WH in the News - Robotics Club thinks outside the box

div.p: Here is another great article from LehighValleyLive Warren Hills robotics club thinks outside box, raises thousands to produce PPE - ALWAYS A GREAT DAY TO BE A BLUE STREAK!

td.div: The Mission of the Franklin Township Public Schools is to provide excellent educational opportunities that meet or exceed New Jersey Core Curriculum Content Standards for every student...
The Mansfield Township Elementary School District partners with the community to provide a meaningful and rigorous education that instills the value of lifelong learning, and empowers all students...
We are excited about our school and our progressive educational technology, exceptional course offerings and our innovative and enriching programs and activities...
The Washington Township School District is a place that reflects, nurtures and promotes the sense of fellowship so valued by the community it serves...
The Oxford Township School District views as its mission the development of every student in a challenging, yet caring educational and character-building environment...
